info.title: Breeze API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing yield farming operations, funds, and user authentication

200.description: Organization fund access records retrieved successfully

post.description: Generates raw Solana instructions for depositing funds into a strategy. Use this endpoint for advanced use cases where you need more control over transaction construction.

Generates a complete, versioned, serialized unsigned Solana transaction for depositing funds into a strategy. The returned base64-encoded transaction can be deserialized, signed by the user's wallet, and submitted to the Solana network.

404.description: Fund not found or no fees configured

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: Start timestamp for metrics range (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: End timestamp for metrics range (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: aggregation_window
parameters.description: Optional aggregation window (e.g., '1h', '1d', '5m') - if not provided, database will choose optimal window

404.description: Fund not found or no data available

get.summary: Get only the supported base assets from global configuration

403.description: Access denied - API key belongs to different organization
Access denied - API key belongs to different organization

404.description: Fund not found or no data available

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a strategy, including the strategy name, list of supported assets, overall APY, and per-asset APY breakdown.
Retrieves balance information for a user with optional filtering by asset. Returns position values and deposit amounts with pagination support.

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Filter by specific asset (token symbol or mint address)

get.summary: Get user balances with strategy information
get.description: Retrieves detailed balance information for a user, including strategy details, token information, position values, deposited amounts, yield earned, APY, and last update timestamp.

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Filter by specific asset (token symbol or mint address)

total_position_value.description: Total current position value in token's smallest unit

total_deposited_value.description: Total deposited value in token's smallest unit

yield_earned.description: Yield earned in token's smallest unit

get.description: Retrieves the total yield earned by a user across all their positions. Supports optional currency conversion and filtering by balance or base asset.

post.description: Generates raw Solana instructions for withdrawing funds from a strategy. Use this endpoint for advanced use cases where you need more control over transaction construction.

Generates a complete, versioned, serialized unsigned Solana transaction for withdrawing funds from a strategy. The returned base64-encoded transaction can be deserialized, signed by the user's wallet, and submitted to the Solana network.

get.summary: Get a specific yield source by its ID with basic stats
Get yield sources with optional base asset filter and pagination

parameters.name: base_asset
parameters.description: Base asset identifier to filter by (e.g., USDC, SOL, ETH)

200.description: Yield sources retrieved successfully grouped by protocol

min_position_settle_time.description: Minimum position settle time in seconds

base_asset_mint.description: Base asset mint address (e.g., USDC mint)

organization_id.description: Optional organization ID to associate with the fund

yield_source_ids.description: Yield source IDs - one per protocol, must match base asset mint

aggregation_window.description: Aggregation window (e.g., "1h", "1d", "5m") representing time between data points

data.description: Array of aggregated metric data points

end.description: End timestamp of the data range

start.description: Start timestamp of the data range

aggregation_window.description: Optional aggregation window (e.g., "1h", "1d", "5m") - if not provided, database will choose optimal window

end_timestamp.description: End timestamp for metrics range (Unix timestamp)

start_timestamp.description: Start timestamp for metrics range (Unix timestamp)

supported_base_assets.description: List of supported base asset mint addresses

updated_at_slot.description: Slot when the config was last updated

updated_at_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the config was last updated

active.description: Whether the API key is active

created_at.description: Timestamp when the API key was created

last_used_at.description: Timestamp when the API key was last used

scopes.description: Permissions or scopes for the API key

api_key.description: The newly created API key data

api_keys.description: List of API keys for the organization

fee_distribution_key.description: Fee distribution key for the organization
Fee distribution key for the organization

pubkey.description: Unique identifier for the yield source

updated_at_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was last updated

deposit_instructions.description: Array of Solana instructions for the deposit operation

lookup_table.description: Address of the lookup table for the transaction

OrganizationFundsResponse.description: Organization funds response with admin flag

scopes.description: Permissions or scopes for the API key

active.description: Whether the API key is active

count.description: Number of yield sources in this protocol

yield_sources.description: List of yield sources for this protocol

pubkey.description: 32-byte public key as an array of integers

is_signer.description: Whether the account is a signer

program_id.description: 32-byte program ID as an array of integers

accounts.description: Array of account metadata for the instruction

data.description: Instruction data as an array of bytes

assets.description: List of asset addresses included in the strategy

apy.description: Overall annual percentage yield for the strategy

supported_base_assets.description: List of supported base assets with metadata

withdraw_instructions.description: Array of Solana instructions for the withdraw operation

lookup_table.description: Address of the lookup table for the transaction
